EmailTemplate.name: 201902_Global_Email_GoDirectRouter_WebCast_TM.201902_Global_Email_GoDirectRouter
EmailTemplate.subject: Webcast – How to Optimize Your Network and Pay Less with the GoDirect Router™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Are you getting the max potential out of your in-flight connectivity? Does your current experience keep you informed about the status of your network and give you the control to make sure the experience isn’t disrupted?
Join our webcast on February 21 at 7:00 a.m. PT / 10:00 a.m. ET to learn more about the unsung hero behind every gigabyte you download..your router. Discover how using the right device can help you optimize your network, stay informed of your connectivity status and help you control your costs at the same time.
Check out our webcast How to Optimize your Network and Pay Less with the GoDirect Router to see for yourself.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_d4aBTGqdQ46KS6k1zBLmxA]]>
